title: Bug 4329: No results If searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329: No results If searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
OB: When searching via Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
EB: When searching via Package view selection and dialog, the expected behavior is to display results.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Select a package.
3. Open the search dialog.
4. Perform a search.
